thread.title: Jets offer punter Steve Weatherford job during radio show
thread.title_full: Jets offer punter Steve Weatherford job during radio show

title: Jets offer punter Steve Weatherford job during radio show
text: > Top News Jets offer punter Steve Weatherford job during radio show FILE - In this Sunday, Aug. 3, 2014 file photo, New York Giants punter Steve Weatherford (5) kicks against the Buffalo Bills during the Pro Football Hall of Fame exhibition NFL football game in Canton, Ohio. Steve Weatherford was co-hosting a radio show Saturday morning Oct. 24, 2015 when he got the phone call â€” and not from just any listener. The New York Jets were on the line, and they were offering the veteran punter a job. (AP Photo/David Richard, File)
